app_descript:
FamilyAlbum

Brief: FamilyAlbum is a private photo-sharing app designed for bringing families closer. It offers a secure platform to share memories solely with invited family and friends, free from advertisements and uncompromised privacy. The app simplifies the way of sharing special moments while catering to not just connectivity but also creating physical memorabilia through their photobook services.
